content.text: {"translationLines":[{"lineNumber":123031,"originalJapaneseLine":"「不憫だ……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"It's pitiful...\""},{"lineNumber":123032,"originalJapaneseLine":"ランス城では余暇を利用しての、","translatedEnglishLine":"At Rance Castle, during their leisure time,"},{"lineNumber":123033,"originalJapaneseLine":"ドッジボール大会が行われていた。","translatedEnglishLine":"a dodgeball tournament was being held."},{"lineNumber":123034,"originalJapaneseLine":"「おう、謙信、同じチームだな。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hey, Kenshin, we're on the same team."},{"lineNumber":123035,"originalJapaneseLine":"　今日は頼むぞ」","translatedEnglishLine":"I'm counting on you today.\""},{"lineNumber":123036,"originalJapaneseLine":"「……うむ」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...Yes.\""},{"lineNumber":123037,"originalJapaneseLine":"「しかし……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"However...\""},{"lineNumber":123038,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ん？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hm?\""},{ "lineNumber":123039,"originalJapaneseLine":"「今、世界は戦火に包まれている……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Right now, the world is engulfed in flames of war..."},{"lineNumber":123040,"originalJapaneseLine":"　このようなことをしていていいのだろうか」","translatedEnglishLine":"Is it really alright to be doing something like this?\""},{"lineNumber":123041,"originalJapaneseLine":"「たまの休暇は必要だろう。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"A rare break is necessary, after all."},{"lineNumber":123042,"originalJapaneseLine":"　誰が言い出したことかは知らんがな」","translatedEnglishLine":"I don't know who came up with this idea though.\""},{"lineNumber":123043,"originalJapaneseLine":"「がははは、俺のチームには謙信がいるのだ！","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Gahaha, my team has Kenshin!"},{"lineNumber":123044,"originalJapaneseLine":"　楽勝だな！」","translatedEnglishLine":"This will be an easy win!\""},{"lineNumber":123045,"originalJapaneseLine":"「…………」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"........\""},{ "lineNumber":123046,"originalJapaneseLine":"「勝つと……貴方は嬉しい？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"When you win... does it make you happy?\""},{"lineNumber":123047,"originalJapaneseLine":"「そうだな、ドッジなんて下らんが、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Well, dodgeball is trivial, but"},{"lineNumber":123048,"originalJapaneseLine":"　折角なら勝った方が気分いいな」","translatedEnglishLine":"if possible, it's nicer to be the one who wins.\""},{"lineNumber":123049,"originalJapaneseLine":"「…………」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"........\""},{ "lineNumber":123050,"originalJapaneseLine":"「分かった」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Understood.\""},{"lineNumber":123051,"originalJapaneseLine":"「私の命を賭けてでも、","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Even if I have to stake my life,"},{"lineNumber":123052,"originalJapaneseLine":"　必ず貴方を勝利へ導くと約束する」","translatedEnglishLine":"I promise I will surely lead you to victory.\""},{"lineNumber":123053,"originalJapaneseLine":"「いや……何もそこまで気合い入れんでいいぞ」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"No... there's no need to get that fired up.\""},{"lineNumber":123054,"originalJapaneseLine":"「…………」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"........\""},{ "lineNumber":123055,"originalJapaneseLine":"「今日はがんばる」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"I'll do my best today.\""},{"lineNumber":123056,"originalJapaneseLine":"「そんくらい、そんくらい」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"That's about right, that's about right.\""},{"lineNumber":123057,"originalJapaneseLine":"「行けー、謙信！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Go, Kenshin!\""},{"lineNumber":123058,"originalJapaneseLine":"「はい！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Yes!\""},{ "lineNumber":123059,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ぎゃー！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Gyaa!\""},{"lineNumber":123060,"originalJapaneseLine":"「謙信ゴー！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Kenshin, go!\""},{"lineNumber":123061,"originalJapaneseLine":"「承知！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Understood!\""},{"lineNumber":123062,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ほんげー！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hongee!\""},{"lineNumber":123063,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ズドドドーンと行け！　謙信！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Charge with a boom! Kenshin!\""},{ "lineNumber":123064,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ずどどどぉん」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Zudododoon!\" (sound effect)"},{"lineNumber":123065,"originalJapaneseLine":"「あんぎゃーーーー！」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Angyaaaaa!\""},{"lineNumber":123066,"originalJapaneseLine":"ランスのチームは謙信の活躍により、","translatedEnglishLine":"Thanks to Kenshin's efforts, Rance's team"},{"lineNumber":123067,"originalJapaneseLine":"破竹の勢いで勝ち続けた。","translatedEnglishLine":"continued to win with unstoppable momentum."},{"lineNumber":123068,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ぐえ〜……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Ugh...\""},{"lineNumber":123069,"originalJapaneseLine":"　け、謙信様、強すぎます……」","translatedEnglishLine":"L-Lord Kenshin, you're too strong...\""},{"lineNumber":123070,"originalJapaneseLine":"「勝子、虎子。","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Katsuko, Torako."},{"lineNumber":123071,"originalJapaneseLine":"　勝負とは非情」","translatedEnglishLine":"Victory and defeat are ruthless.\""},{"lineNumber":123072,"originalJapaneseLine":"「くすん、くすん……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Sniffle, sniffle...\""},{"lineNumber":123073,"originalJapaneseLine":"「はらほろひれはれ……」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Harahorohirehare...\" (onomatopoeia for sobbing)"},{"lineNumber":123074,"originalJapaneseLine":"「がははははははは！","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Gahahahahahaha!"},{"lineNumber":123075,"originalJapaneseLine":"　圧勝、楽勝、万歳三唱だな！」","translatedEnglishLine":"A crushing victory, piece of cake, let's three cheers!\""},{"lineNumber":123076,"originalJapaneseLine":"「これも謙信のおかげだ」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"This is all thanks to Kenshin.\""},{"lineNumber":123077,"originalJapaneseLine":"「私は貴方の役に立てたか？」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Was I of help to you?\""},{"lineNumber":123078,"originalJapaneseLine":"「うむ、立った立った」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Yes, you were helpful.\""},{"lineNumber":123079,"originalJapaneseLine":"「そうか」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"I see.\""},{"lineNumber":123080,"originalJapaneseLine":"今は別のチーム同士が戦っていた。","translatedEnglishLine":"Meanwhile, two other teams were battling."},{"lineNumber":123081,"originalJapaneseLine":"戦っている者同士の怒声、","translatedEnglishLine":"The shouts of those fighting,"},{"lineNumber":123082,"originalJapaneseLine":"応援する者達の声が中庭に響いていた。","translatedEnglishLine":"and the cheers of supporters echoed through the courtyard."},{"lineNumber":123083,"originalJapaneseLine":"「……いい、風が吹いている」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"...A nice breeze is blowing.\""},{"lineNumber":123084,"originalJapaneseLine":"「ん？　そうだな、涼しいな」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"Hm? Yeah, it's cool.\""},{"lineNumber":123085,"originalJapaneseLine":"「貴方がこうやって","translatedEnglishLine":"\"The reason you allowed everyone to play like this,"},{"lineNumber":123086,"originalJapaneseLine":"　皆で遊ぶことを許可した理由、","translatedEnglishLine":"to have fun together,"},{"lineNumber":123087,"originalJapaneseLine":"　今更分かった」","translatedEnglishLine":"I understand now.\""},{"lineNumber":123088,"originalJapaneseLine":"「こういう時間が……","translatedEnglishLine":"\"This kind of time..."},{"lineNumber":123089,"originalJapaneseLine":"　皆に必要だったんだな」","translatedEnglishLine":"was what everyone needed.\""},{"lineNumber":123090,"originalJapaneseLine":"「…………」","translatedEnglishLine":"\"........\""}]}

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランス城では余暇を利用しての、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: At Rance Castle, during their leisure time,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ドッジボール大会が行われていた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: a dodgeball tournament was being held.
"Hey, Kenshin, we're on the same team.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「今、世界は戦火に包まれている……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Right now, the world is engulfed in flames of war...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: このようなことをしていていいのだろうか」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Is it really alright to be doing something like this?"
"A rare break is necessary, after all.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 誰が言い出したことかは知らんがな」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I don't know who came up with this idea though."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「がははは、俺のチームには謙信がいるのだ！

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: This will be an easy win!"
"When you win... does it make you happy?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「そうだな、ドッジなんて下らんが、
折角なら勝った方が気分いいな」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: if possible, it's nicer to be the one who wins."
"Even if I have to stake my life,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 必ず貴方を勝利へ導くと約束する」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I promise I will surely lead you to victory."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「いや……何もそこまで気合い入れんでいいぞ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "No... there's no need to get that fired up."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ズドドドーンと行け！　謙信！」
ランスのチームは謙信の活躍により、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Thanks to Kenshin's efforts, Rance's team

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 破竹の勢いで勝ち続けた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: continued to win with unstoppable momentum.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 圧勝、楽勝、万歳三唱だな！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: A crushing victory, piece of cake, let's three cheers!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 今は別のチーム同士が戦っていた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Meanwhile, two other teams were battling.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 戦っている者同士の怒声、
応援する者達の声が中庭に響いていた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and the cheers of supporters echoed through the courtyard.
"The reason you allowed everyone to play like this,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 皆で遊ぶことを許可した理由、
皆に必要だったんだな」

translationLines.description: Array of objects, each representing a line from the input

originalJapaneseLine.description: The original line in Japanese exactly as it was in the input

translatedEnglishLine.description: The original line translated to English

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ランス城では余暇を利用しての、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: At Rance Castle, during their leisure time,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: ドッジボール大会が行われていた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: a dodgeball tournament was being held.
"Hey, Kenshin, we're on the same team.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「今、世界は戦火に包まれている……
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "Right now, the world is engulfed in flames of war...

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: このようなことをしていていいのだろうか」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Is it really alright to be doing something like this?"
"A rare break is necessary, after all.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 誰が言い出したことかは知らんがな」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I don't know who came up with this idea though."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「がははは、俺のチームには謙信がいるのだ！

translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: This will be an easy win!"
"When you win... does it make you happy?"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「そうだな、ドッジなんて下らんが、
折角なら勝った方が気分いいな」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: if possible, it's nicer to be the one who wins."
"Even if I have to stake my life,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 必ず貴方を勝利へ導くと約束する」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: I promise I will surely lead you to victory."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「いや……何もそこまで気合い入れんでいいぞ」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: "No... there's no need to get that fired up."

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 「ズドドドーンと行け！　謙信！」
ランスのチームは謙信の活躍により、
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Thanks to Kenshin's efforts, Rance's team

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 破竹の勢いで勝ち続けた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: continued to win with unstoppable momentum.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 圧勝、楽勝、万歳三唱だな！」
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: A crushing victory, piece of cake, let's three cheers!"

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 今は別のチーム同士が戦っていた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: Meanwhile, two other teams were battling.

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 戦っている者同士の怒声、
応援する者達の声が中庭に響いていた。
translationLines.translatedEnglishLine: and the cheers of supporters echoed through the courtyard.
"The reason you allowed everyone to play like this,

translationLines.originalJapaneseLine: 皆で遊ぶことを許可した理由、
皆に必要だったんだな」
